description: Preet Bharara on justice, a chronicle of gun violence in Chicago, a grown-up fairy tale and more.
title: 12 New Books to Watch for in March
title_page: 12 New Books to Watch for in March - The New York Times
maintext:
Thereâ€™s a book for every taste coming out in March: one about a fictional band that calls to mind Fleetwood Mac, a deep dive into the culture of programmers in Silicon Valley, a darkly comic novel about a suburb in crisis and more. Here are some titles to watch for.
